comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: For 2025, my expectations are that we get more adoption for Bitcoin. We should start seeing some cascading effects of Bitcoin ETFs which should leak into more financial institutions to adopt and align more products and services to be bitcoin oriented. Price will definitely grow too as more adoption kicks in. As a matter of fact, I do expect the process to finally reach a milestone price of 6 figures.For the tech, I expect improvements that would make the tech better for all usersÂ  because average users will immediately leave if fees are between $5 to $10.Bitcoin is money and we need to make that money better than the standard fiat. That means super cheap tx fees at reasonable times.
